snippet: At least 13 people were killed and over 100 injured in a double bombing at a police station in Russia’s tumultuous North Caucasus region late Thursday night.
abstract: At least 13 people are killed and more than 100 injured after double bombing at a police station in Russia's tumultuous North Caucasus region; attack is stark reminder of challenges facing Vladimir V Putin in the region as he prepares to take over presidency.
lead_paragraph: At least 13 people were killed and over 100 injured in a double bombing at a police station in Russia’s tumultuous North Caucasus region late Thursday night.

headline.seo: Double Blast in Volatile Russian Region Kills 13
headline.main: Double Blast in Volatile Russian Region Kills 13
headline.print_headline: Police Station Hit by Blasts In Dagestan
